```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
```

"age_gaps"\
The age gap between the famous movie couples.\
Jon Harmon\
February 14, 2023\
html\

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
df <- read.csv("age_gaps.csv")
ggplot(df, aes(x = age_difference)) +
  geom_histogram(binwidth = 5, color = "white") +
  labs(title = "Varying Age Differences in Famous Movie Couples",
       x = "Age Difference (years)", y = "Couples")
```
